bibl.title: Dating an Oil Lamp of Multicultural Design.
bibl.note: Museum of Islamic Art in Cairo (registration No. 31/19447), 1rst - early 3rd century H. / 7th - 9th century CE. The ornementation is influenced by the Hellenistic and Syrio-Byzantine traditions.

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Australian Centre for Egyptology
